name: XED OUT SUPA STOMPER PHAT PANTS
description:
Be the brightest thing on the dance floor with these crazzy phat pants designed specifically for stomping the shit out of yourself! They feature 5 different types of fabric (stretchy black lightweight denim, hazard yellow fleece, recycled black and white striped heavy satin, imported geometrical Indonesian cotton with neon orange and green X’s, and heavyweight black satin). There are 6 belt loops, two D-rings connected to the two front belt loops, a drawstring waist, hidden drawstrings at the end of each leg, and 10 pockets total (2 of ‘em are Velcro). (Yes, that was a run-on sentence :)

	Heavy duty and guaranteed to get you through lots of outdoor party environments!

	I’ll have the measurements up soon but they basically fit size M-XL.

name: MEDUSA Legwarmers
description:
These completely original pair of warmers are art for your legs! They are made out of 5 different types of fabric, rocket blue, neon green, and black thread, non slip elastic, and love. The elastic makes them very versitle in sizing, but I’d say they would fit sizes S-L. Oh, and they really do keep your legs warm.

	Go to Burning Man.

name: Supa Crazzy Phat Pants of the Century
description: Exactly like it sounds. These super crazzy pants are an eye catcher fo sure! They are made out of 3 different types of fabric (crushed velvet, light tie dyed denim, and a heavy black and white patterned cotton). They are sewn with 7different colors of thread (neon green, neon pink, neon orange, aqua green, purple, black, and white).They have 2 circular pockets with visible zippers, 2 small Velco pockets (not shown), 4 D-ring attachments, a drawstring waist with 6 belt loops, and hidden drawstrings at the end of each leg. Measurements: 38” drawstring waist fits sizes s-L 31” inseam (43” from waist to ankle) 39” leg bottoms Best worn dancing in blacklighted areas with heavy bass.
